package body acl_dsd_tapi_pck
is




function dsd_select_row( i_dsd_id   in  acl_detailed_state_definitions.id%type
                       , o_rt_dsd   out acl_detailed_state_definitions%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.dsd_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_dsd ( i_dsd_id   in  acl_detailed_state_definitions.id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from acl_detailed_state_definitions dsd
            where dsd.id = i_dsd_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_dsd( i_dsd_id => i_dsd_id );
         fetch c_dsd into o_rt_dsd;
         l_found := c_dsd%found;
         close c_dsd;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_dsd%isopen
         then
            close c_dsd;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end dsd_select_row;

           from acl_detailed_state_definitions dsd
          where dsd.name = i_dsd_name ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_dsd(i_dsd_name => i_dsd_name);
         fetch c_dsd into o_rt_dsd;
         l_found := c_dsd%found;
         close c_dsd;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
   when others
    then
      if c_dsd%isopen
      then
         close c_dsd;
      end if;
      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end dsd_select_row_uk_1;

function dsd_select_row_upd( i_dsd_id   in  acl_detailed_state_definitions.id%type
                           , o_rt_dsd   out acl_detailed_state_definitions%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.dsd_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_dsd ( i_dsd_id   in  acl_detailed_state_definitions.id%type )
   is
           select *
             from acl_detailed_state_definitions dsd
            where dsd.id = i_dsd_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_dsd( i_dsd_id => i_dsd_id );
   fetch c_dsd into o_rt_dsd;
   l_found := c_dsd%found;
   close c_dsd;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_dsd%isopen
      then
         close c_dsd;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end dsd_select_row_upd;

function dsd_select_row_upd_uk_1( i_dsd_name   in  acl_detailed_state_definitions.name%type
                                , o_rt_dsd  out acl_detailed_state_definitions%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.dsd_select_row_upd_uk_1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   begin
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      
      l_found := dsd_select_row_uk_1( i_dsd_name   =>  i_dsd_name
                                    , o_rt_dsd => o_rt_dsd );
      if l_found
      then
         
         l_found := dsd_select_row_upd( i_dsd_id => o_rt_dsd.id
                                      , o_rt_dsd => o_rt_dsd );
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

        viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc);
   end;
end dsd_select_row_upd_uk_1;

procedure dsd_lock_row( i_dsd_id   in  acl_detailed_state_definitions.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.dsd_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_dsd ( i_dsd_id   in  acl_detailed_state_definitions.id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from acl_detailed_state_definitions dsd
              where dsd.id = i_dsd_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_dsd_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                dsd_lock_row_nowait( i_dsd_id => i_dsd_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_dsd( i_dsd_id => i_dsd_id );
                  close c_dsd;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_dsd%isopen
         then
            close c_dsd;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end dsd_lock_row;

procedure dsd_lock_row_nowait( i_dsd_id   in  acl_detailed_state_definitions.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.dsd_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_dsd ( i_dsd_id   in  acl_detailed_state_definitions.id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from acl_detailed_state_definitions dsd
               where dsd.id = i_dsd_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_dsd_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_dsd( i_dsd_id => i_dsd_id );

            close c_dsd;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_dsd%isopen
        then
           close c_dsd;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_dsd_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end dsd_lock_row_nowait;


end acl_dsd_tapi_pck;
